॥ You have become my son. You have been waking up with a lot of love and affection for me. I have so much love and affection for you. I think that the love and affection that I have for you and you have for me is the only reward, and I have written this settlement document and given it to you gratuitously. Having decided to provide you with some fixed income, I have decided to become your wife and heir. Having received and having all the rights and interests, namely Rs. 2,30,000/- (two lakhs and thirty thousand rupees in words), the vacant land mentioned in the third paragraph of the Schedule hereto, having been acquired by me, is hereby sold to you free of charge and you have full rights in the property mentioned in the Schedule hereto and have this deed of sale executed. I hereby transfer the property mentioned in the Schedule hereto to you with all the rights. Therefore, from now on, you shall be the full owner of the property mentioned in the Schedule hereto and shall build houses etc., pay house taxes etc., exercise all the rights and duties, and shall be entitled to all the rights of donation, sale, inheritance, and inheritance. I shall enjoy eternal happiness as you give me.
I and my heirs will never have any dispute with you or your heirs regarding this. I hereby certify that the property as per Schedule has never been transferred to the Government, any agency related to the Government or any other person by way of mortgage, agreement or any other transaction and that it is an undisputed property and I hereby give my full consent to this settlement document.
B.K. Khini V.Sheet Endorsement

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 753 of 2026, dated 29/Jan/2026, executed by Boddana Kalavathi in favour of her Son, Boddana Simhachalam towards the property admeasuring an extent of 57.444 Sq. Yds, comprised in survey number 712, situated in Singupuram Village and Gram Panchayat, Srikakulam Mandal, within the District of Srikakulam, registered at sub-registrar office Srikakulam, is bounded as follows: North by: Road South by: Land of Muddada Apparao and others East by: R.C.C. house of Boddana Ammannayudu West by: Vacant site of Gujjala Gowrinaidu Note:Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per recitals of the deed

It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or
Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
